hmi.animation.procanimation
Class Rotation

java.lang.Object
  hmi.xml.XMLStructureAdapter
      hmi.animation.procanimation.Rotation
All Implemented Interfaces:
hmi.xml.XMLStructure
public class Rotation
extends hmi.xml.XMLStructureAdapter

Describes the rotation of a single joint in a formula The rotation can be a function of time t (0 < t < 1) and some parameters

Author:
welberge, Mark ter Maat
